data.text: @AirTalk @kristenrchoi I would like to hear more discussion about the findings within the Covid Vaccine trial documents Pfizer was recently ordered to release. Anti vaxxers are often accused of spreading misinformation, but yet, the subject of the findings has been consistently avoided on this program

For more info on this study:
https://t.co/V3NFr0Hse0

The Nature study mentioned above:
https://t.co/AJVXEbGWj8

Kristen R. Choi on a new study that finds COVID may cause changes in the brain: "It really aligns with what we already know about COVID-19...that it does lasting damage to our bodily and organ systems."
@AirTalk @kristenrchoi in La Canada, what’s the status of omicron specific vaccine/booster? In the fall, do you think we’ll have a choice between the original or omicron specific booster?

Read more about the situation down below 👇

https://t.co/d2dFqIRbhc

Kristen R. Choi on Florida recommending against COVID vaccines for healthy children: "I find this to be quite troubling for public health in a large state...it's contradictory to guidance from the CDC, medical professional and data."

We are now LIVE answering your COVID-19 questions

Listen via the link below https://t.co/K1mBUI8MBm
